column1: Specifications: "Next-gen 2K HD PoE ceiling camera with enhanced dynamic range and low-light performance."
"Weight": "Without mount: 370 g (13.1 oz) With mount: 390 g (13.8 oz)"
"Night mode": "Built-in IR LED illumination and IR cut filter"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 40º C (-4 to 104º F)"
"Web application": "UniFi Protect: Version 2.2.7 or 2.7.28 and later"
"Mobile app": "UniFi Protect iOS™ and Android™:  Version 1.10.0 and later"
